import {useState} from 'react'; import {Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; export default function NavBar() { document.body.setAttribute("dir","rtl") let [isMenuClicked, setIsMenuClicked] = useState(false) let [activeLink, setActiveLink] = useState("banner") function handleClick() { setIsMenuClicked(!isMenuClicked) } function handleActiveLink(target) { console.log(target) setActiveLink(target) } return (

باسل

handleActiveLink("banner")}>من انا handleActiveLink("skills")}>مهاراتي handleActiveLink("projects")}>اعمالي
) }
